p: Initially, we administered alloxan monohydrate (10%, 150 mg/kg) intraperitoneally to the experimental animals for the induction of hyperglycemia. Meanwhile, a control group was also maintained by experimental animals which received an intraperitoneal dose of normal saline. After the alloxan monohydrate injection, the animals were sorted out into diabetic and non-diabetic animals by using a glucometer. The animals with high blood glucose level (diabetes) were subjected to further studies as per the previous reported procedure (Hussain et al., 2019).
